name: Combat Maze
description:
Remember a Time ... When We Pressed Play On Tape
Take Yourself Back To a Time When Gameplay Was Cool
and The Game Music Was 3 Channel, Catchy, Melodic & Original
LET Combat Maze Teleport You Back to That Time

Featuring...
Top Down Style Shooter
Unique 8-bit Style Graphics
4 NEW Commodore 64 Tracks
3 Different Worlds.(IKARI LAND), (NEW BREED) & (COMMANDO PARK)
20 Levels In Each World.

Work Your Way Around The Maze To Find The Flag.
Beware Of Enemy Trying To Stop You....
Collecting Ammo, Health To Help You Get
Though The Maze.
